scripts.setup: npm run link-keys && npm run create-objects && npm install && npm run build-connectors && npm run generate-config && npm run build-qsys && npm run package:release && npm run update-eol && npm run set-permissions
scripts.build-qsys: (ls /QOpenSys/opt && make -C qsys) || npx shx echo "IBM i Asset Build Failed"
scripts.build-interfaces: make -C qsys library -i && make -C qsys generatedtssrc -i
scripts.build-connectors: (ls /QOpenSys/opt && cd node_modules/@eradani-inc/ec-client && make -C native library && make -C native) || npx shx echo "Connector Build Failed"
scripts.create-objects: (ls /QOpenSys/opt && ((system "CRTLIB LIB(ECNCTSBS) TEXT('Eradani Connect Subsystem library')" || npx shx echo "Subsystem Library Already Exists") && system "CRTCLS CLS(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) TEXT('Class for Eradani Connect subsystem')" && system "CRTJOBQ JOBQ(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) TEXT('Job queue for Eradani Connect jobs')" && system "CRTJOBD JOBD(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) JOBQ(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) TEXT('Eradani Connect job description') USER(ECNCT) PRTTXT('Eradani Connect jobs') RQSDTA('call PGM(QP2SHELL) PARM(''/QOpenSys/opt/eradani/eradani-inout-template/start.sh'')')" && system "CRTSBSD SBSD(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) POOLS((1 *BASE)) MAXJOBS(30) TEXT('Eradani Connect subsystem description')" && system "ADDJOBQE SBSD(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) JOBQ(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) MAXACT(15)" && system "ADDRTGE SBSD(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) SEQNBR(9999) CMPVAL(*ANY) PGM(QSYS/QCMD) CLS(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV)" && system "ADDAJE SBSD(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV) JOB(ECIDEV) JOBD(ECNCTSBS/ECIDEV)")) || npx shx echo "QSYS Object Creation Skipped. Consult terminal output for details."
scripts.update-eol: npx shx mv start.sh start.sh.orig && tr -d '' < start.sh.orig > start.sh && npx shx rm start.sh.orig
scripts.set-permissions: (npx shx chmod a+x start.sh && ls /QOpenSys/opt && (system "CHGOBJOWN OBJ(ECNCTSBS) OBJTYPE(*LIB) NEWOWN(ECNCT)" && system "CHGOWN OBJ('/QSYS.lib/ECNCTSBS.lib/*') NEWOWN(ECNCT)" && system "CHGOBJOWN OBJ(ECNCTAPP) OBJTYPE(*LIB) NEWOWN(ECNCT)" && system "CHGOWN OBJ('/QSYS.lib/ECNCTAPP.lib/*') NEWOWN(ECNCT)" && system "CHGOWN OBJ('/QOpenSys/opt/eradani/eradani-inout-template/') NEWOWN(ECNCT) SUBTREE(*ALL)")) || npx shx echo "Object Authority Change Skipped. Consult terminal output for details."
scripts.package:dev: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run build:dev && npm run copy && npm run config && npm run install-npm && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.package:release: npm run clean && npm run format && npm run lint &&npm run build:release && npm run copy && npm run config && npm run install-npm && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.start:debug: node --inspect dist/src/app.js && printf "[1;36mOpen an SSH Tunnel on your local machine with [1;32mssh -L 9229:localhost:9229 user@your.server.address[0m"&& printf "[1;36mThen the Chrome interactive debugger [1;32mopen chrome://inspect in Google Chrome and click Open Dedicated Development Tools for Node[0m"
scripts.docs: ls /QOpenSys/opt || npx typedoc --cleanOutputDir --entryPointStrategy expand src && printf "[1;36mView Generated Documentation with [1;32mnpm run view-docs[0m"
scripts.install-npm: cd dist && (npx shx ln -s ../node_modules node_modules || echo "NPM Module Link Skipped") && cd ..
scripts.link-keys: (ls /QOpenSys/opt && npx shx ln -s /QOpenSys/opt/eradani/.npmrc .npmrc) || npx shx echo "Product Key Link Skipped. Consult terminal output for details."
scripts.copy: (npx shx ln -s ../logs dist/logs || npx shx echo "Logs Directory Creation Skipped") && npx shx cp -r tests qsys LICENSE README.md package.json package-lock.json dist && npx shx cp -r src/interfaces dist/src
scripts.generate-config: npx shx cp ./src/config/default.json ./src/config/development.json && npx shx mkdir -p ./src/config/keys && npm run rotate-keys
scripts.rotate-keys: (npx shx rm ./src/config/keys/*.key || npx shx echo "Generating first-time keys") && ssh-keygen -f ./src/config/keys/jwt-private.key -P '' && npx shx mv ./src/config/keys/jwt-private.key.pub ./src/config/keys/jwt-public.key
